TopicTitle: Link oxidizer and fuel when transferring between tanks

Articles.Content: When using the stock transfer option between fuel tanks, you separately click the in (or out) of liquid fuel and oxidizer. Unless you're using jet engines, though, you'll typically want to keep the proportion between fuel and oxygen, specially if you don't want to transfer until filling one of the tanks. So I think it would be a good idea to be able to link both and start/stop the transfer for both of them at the same time.
